DOC.brief_summary: This study aim investigate effect low intensity cathodal direct current release plasma vascular endothelial growth factor ( VEGF ) nitric oxide ( NO ) diabetic foot ulceration .
DOC.brief_title: Electrical Stimulation Expression VEGF NO Diabetic Foot Ulcer
DOC.detailed_description: Twenty type 2 diabetic patient foot ulceration 13 age-matched healthy subject enrol . Patients randomly assign electrical stimulation ( ES , n=10 ) sham ES ( placebo , n=10 ) group . ES group receive cathodal direct current 1 h/day , 3 days/week , 4 week ( 12 session ) . Blood sample collect VEGF NO measurement first last treatment session intervention . Wound surface area ( WSA ) skin temperature measure 1st , 6th , 12th session .
DOC.criteria: Wagner classification DFU 2 ; age 4060 year ; mild moderate diabetic neuropathy ; ABI > 0.7 wound surface area > 1.5cm2 fracture low limb , severe infection , malignancy , kidney failure , skin disease , osteomyelitis , pregnancy ,
